channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Crossing on West End Lane opposite the smaller Thameslink entrance, 13th January
item.description:
Temporary lights have been installed here and the buttons for pedestrians do not work and the lights never turn red leading to pedestrians getting frustrated and having to cross the road with no lights.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West End Lane, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins not collected, 13th January
item.description:
Rubbish bins not emptied on Spensley Walk
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: BIG pothole, 13th January
item.description:
This took my tyre out. Its a very big pothole wich is hard to see in dark. It's damaging a lot of cars but LBB dont seem to be priorirising it. £165 to get someone out to put a new tyre on - thanks Bromley...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 240, Chislehurst Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Zebra crossing near Woburn Walk, 13th January
item.description:
I didn't think a vehicle was going to brake to let me cross so I stopped abruptly. I slipped on the slope of the pavement to the road. I was crossing from east to west and it was the right hand side of the slope. Luckily the vehicle did brake otherwise I would have been really close to getting hit. I was wearing good walking boots but the conditions were wet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Upper Woburn Place, St Pancras, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Sandway Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London

item.title: Barrier is bent, 13th January
item.description:
The barrier is on the school crossing. The damage that has been done is dangerous when the kids cross over to and from the school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bedonwell Road, Upper Belvedere, Greater London

item.title: Drain not working on the square, 13th January
item.description:
The drain on the square is overflowing, now ankle deep. This is a recurring issue but because of the weather it’s causing disruption to people walking through the square because it’s not visible. This is the drain cover just outside the vortex jazz club

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gillett Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Major potholes across the large junction, 13th January
item.description:
Dangerous deep broken road across entire large junction. When potholes covered with rainwater and even when not they're especially dangerous to bicycles and motorcyclists. Please attend to this urgently before someone dies.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Dulwich Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
